@Cubstudios, you need a 3D TV or 3D screen computer, both take the split screen videos and create a 3d image that you can only view with their own(TV or screen) 3d glasses. You cannot watch "Half side by side" 3d movies on regular computers so be careful before downloading large files (13GB) for nothing. (sorry for my bad english)
